entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:46 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 03:48 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure: 98.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: SSE 35 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 15 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
